Title: Lost Boy, Lost Girl.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Peter Straub.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=YWrcm8VcvbYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: The bizarre suicide of a woman and the disappearance of her teenage son, Mark, draws the boy's uncle, Timothy Underhill, back to his hometown of Millhaven, where his investigation uncovers a neighborhood haunted by the presence of a serial killer and by an abandoned house whose inhabitant, a lost girl, may have lured Mark into her mysterious domain. Reprint..
